class.name: ChainIK3D
class.brief_description: A [SkeletonModifier3D] to apply inverse kinematics to bone chains containing an arbitrary number of bones.
class.description: Base class of [SkeletonModifier3D] that automatically generates a joint list from the bones between the root bone and the end bone.

method.name: get_end_bone
method.description: Returns the end bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: get_end_bone_direction
method.description: Returns the tail direction of the end bone of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_length
method.description: Returns the end bone tail length of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_name
method.description: Returns the end bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: get_joint_bone
method.description: Returns the bone index at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_bone_name
method.description: Returns the bone name at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_count
method.description: Returns the joint count of the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_root_bone
method.description: Returns the root bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: get_root_bone_name
method.description: Returns the root bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: is_end_bone_extended
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the end bone is extended to have a tail.

method.name: set_end_bone
method.description: Sets the end bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: set_end_bone_direction
method.description: Sets the end bone tail direction of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_length
method.description: Sets the end bone tail length of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_name
method.description: Sets the end bone name of the bone chain. [b]Note:[/b] The end bone must be the root bone or a child of the root bone. If they are the same, the tail must be extended by [method set_extend_end_bone] to modify the bone.

method.name: set_extend_end_bone
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the end bone is extended to have a tail. The extended tail config is allocated to the last element in the joint list. In other words, if you set [param enabled] to [code]false[/code], the config of the last element in the joint list has no effect in the simulated result.

method.name: set_root_bone
method.description: Sets the root bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: set_root_bone_name
method.description: Sets the root bone name of the bone chain.
